description.full: This game was classified by the community with the following category scores - Violence=0/3, Sex=0/3, Mature Content=0/3. Solve over 750 levels across three difficulties in this mind bending puzzle game. Try the new Time Attack mode to see how many puzzles you can solve before time runs out.
description.short: Solve over 750 levels across three difficulties in this mind bending puzzle game. Try the new Time Attack mode to see how many puzzles you can solve before time runs out.
